headline: Alsea: Wraps Chipotle Into Its Portfolio

headline: How Noodles & Company beat Chipotle’s Q1 comparable sales
summary: The chain posted a 4.4% increase in comp sales in Q1 2025 even though larger chains like Chipotle and Wingstop posted anemic comps.
